main event: A UFO was observed in Fort Lupton, Colorado on June 24, 1967.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 30 minutes,The object was noted to be stationary during the observation,There was no sufficient data for scientific evaluation provided in the report,The object was described as round and blue-white,The report does mention an elongated light as part of the observation.
witness description: Guy J. Laflamme, A.T., USAF, Lowry AFB
